description: The Beta SV Bib is created to carry you across a range of pursuits in severe mountain conditions. Built from Gore-Tex PRO with Most Rugged Technology – a next-gen material we developed in collaboration with Gore – it delivers exceptionally durable waterproof, windproof, breathable protection. The WaterTight™ zippers fully separate for a drop seat option and to ease removal over boots, N140d Gore-Tex PRO reinforcements enhance durability, Keprotec™ instep guards resist cuts and abrasion, and an integrated Recco® reflector improves searchability in emergency situations.
name: Arcteryx Beta SV Bib, Short - Mens
